DocAttribute.Name: RelatingProcess
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the process, that is the predecessor.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedProcess
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the process, that is the successor.

DocAttribute.Name: TimeLag
DocAttribute.Documentation: Time duration of the sequence, it is the time lag between the predecessor and the successor as specified by the SequenceType.

DocAttribute.Name: SequenceType
DocAttribute.Documentation: The way in which the time lag applies to the sequence.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedSequenceType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Allows for specification of user defined type of the sequence beyond the enumeration values (START_START, START_FINISH, FINISH_START, FINISH_FINISH) provided by _SequenceType_ attribute of type _IfcSequenceEnum_. When a value is provided for attribute _UserDefinedSequenceType_ in parallel the attribute _SequenceType_ shall have enumeration value USERDEFINED.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE Attribute added

DocWhereRule.Name: AvoidInconsistentSequence
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The RelatingProcess shall not point to the same instance as the RelatedProcess.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectSequenceType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedSequenceType must be asserted when the value of SequenceType is set to USERDEFINED.
